      • isMissingAreaCode

        public static boolean isMissingAreaCode(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Checks if a parse-able phoneNumber contains seven digits.
        Returns:
        true if number is parse-able and has only seven digits

      • safeTransformToCommonFormat

        public static java.lang.String safeTransformToCommonFormat(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        For displaying phone numbers in a consistent way. "Safe", meaning it will not throw an exception for invalid numbers. If phoneNumber is an invalid number, this method will return phoneNumber (the input string).
        Returns:
        Formatted phone number string, or the original phoneNumber if there is a parse exception
